title: Hello World
content: Create a simple placeholder task for future testing and onboarding workflows.

title: Decide on block cache key normalization strategy
content:
Investigate whether rendered block-level cache keys need hashing or truncation before persistence. Capture current storage limits (DB columns, external caches) and propose an approach if keys can exceed safe lengths.

Linked spec: [[s-j4ju]]

title: Clarify tooling for block-level cache key variants
content:
Determine whether we need admin or UI tooling to list/manage per-block cache key variants now that templates exist. Scope could include API surface and frontend hooks.

Linked spec: [[s-j4ju]]

title: Evaluate security of exposing prior block outputs to cache templates
content:
Assess whether allowing cache key templates to reference previous block outputs introduces data governance or secret-leak risks. Document mitigations or restrictions if necessary before rollout.

Linked spec: [[s-j4ju]]
